title: Workshop on Exploring Creativity in Instructional Design

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of Basic Instructional Design Concepts
context.additional_context: Providing a collaborative learning environment for general citizens to explore the integration of creativity and instructional design

learning_goals: Learners can apply and explain at least three creative approaches to the instructional design process
Learners develop at least two creative instructional design solutions with peer learners through a collaborative meaning-making workshop

Learners can diagnose their current level through the Creative Self-Efficacy Survey (10 items) and create a 4-week action plan that includes three or more actionable strategies (e.g., weekly idea journaling, requesting peer feedback).
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
